Description:
Our client is a Leading Company in Retail Industry. They are now looking for a Store Operations Coordinator to join them.Roles & Responsibilities:Secure all Stock and non-stocks are organized as per brand standards in store stock room and OSL.
Ensure daily replenishment from OSL to Store Stock room securing a never out of stock mindset.
Orders for all non-stocks are done in a timely manner, ensuring they are never out of stock but managing space accordingly.
Cycle counts weekly and any issues escalate to SM.
Coordinate and monitor operations of the supply chain
First point of contact with JV partner and RDC to ensure all collections and deliveries are on time and any ad hoc requests you plan to ensure all parties work together for a seamless flow achieving all deadlines set.
Responsible for all administration for any transfers, receipts or returns etc Salary: AED 11000 - AED 13000Skills
Skills:
Immediate Joiners 
Must have prior experience as Operations Coordinator
Must have strong computer skills, Excel, Word, SAP GPOS etc

Bachelorâ€™s Degree Preferred.
Excellent command of both written and spoken English
